page.title: 09Life Styles in Penn
page.content: Catherine and Paul visited Miss Evans who lives in the Almshouses in Penn. Miss Evans was born in Penn on 12th. June 1902. She was one of eight children. Miss Evans was in service in a private school and then at a large house in Penn until she was 68. She has attended St. Barts. church since she was a very youmg child and all her family used to go to church together. She still goes to the early morning communion every Sunday. Miss Evans goes for a walk most days and enjoys listening to the radio and reading. She does not watch very much television except for Songs of Praise on Sunday evenings and the news. She will be quite happy to stay in the Almshouses until she is unable to look after herself.
